column4: i downloded GDM-penguin.tar.gz from art.gnome.org, how do i install it?
drag the theme over to theme manager or open install and go to where you dl'd it and add
it says ""penguin" does not appear to be a valid theme." ???

you need to unpack that archive and then drop the gtk part on the theme manager; there are several others (fonts, etc) that you need to put into their respective places as well; if you want a slightly nicer theme (ie easier to install) you may consider imetal for gnome theme at gnome-look
ok.. can u give me a direct link? :)
ur cool dude.. tnx for the help... cheers
this one you need to drag out the gtk folder and drop that on theme manager
